name: GERD (Acid Reflux)

Eat smaller, frequent meals instead of large meals
Do not lie down immediately after eating (wait at least 2-3 hours)
Elevate the head of the bed to reduce nighttime reflux
preventions: Exercise regularly but avoid heavy workouts right after meals
Wear loose-fitting clothes around the abdomen
